Stephan Risch

WebDeveloper // Designer // Programmer

About Myself

Stephan is interested in many things. This website is supposed to tell you a bit about his interests in programming, design and IT. About three years ago he started to become active in pursuing skills in web technologies.

This led him to found the Autori Agentur with his dear friends Torsten and Aubry. Under the name of Autori the three have started to implement small projects for companies and private persons.

Besides this Stephan is also a student. He finished his Bachelor’s degree in 2014 in Media Management and Journalism. Following his first studies he started his Master studies in Audiovisual Culture and Communication and he will also pursue another Bachelor’s degree in Information Science at a distance university.

In 2014 his friend Torsten and him also had the funny idea of founding a Google Developer’s Group in Magdeburg. They are still a young and small group who talk about Google web technologies - but you have to start somewhere.

References

Stephan is one of the most focused and most driven guys I know. He likes to learn new things every day - besides that he tries to be the hippest hipster ... which he is not.

Working with Stephan was the highlight of my career. Another moment of note was collecting the largest number of paperclips in the office.

Yeah, I guess he's good at computers or something, and I am not just saying that, 'cause he is my boyfriend.
